Html:
I am having problems getting the control to work with visual C# 2010 express.  I install it just like any other control.  I create a new windows form project and drop the control on the form.  Save it and then try to compile and I get the following error.

 
 
 

The designer cannot process the code at line 44: this.gMapControl1.MouseWheelZoomType = GMap.NET.MouseWheelZoomType.MousePositionAndCenter; The code within the method 'InitializeComponent' is generated by the designer and should not be manually modified. Please remove any changes and try opening the designer again. 

 

It works fine with Visual Studio 2005.  I am wondering if there is something different to do in express when installing.  I am using the 1.6 version, in case it makes a difference.

I searched the forums and didn't see anything that seemed to pertain.  Is anyone running this on Visual C# 2010 express?
well just try to remove that line, maybe express designer has some bugs ;/
